author: pieterdavid
body:
- `SiStripFolderOrganizer::getFolderName(int32_t, std::string&)` was deprecated, and is apparently not used anywhere in CMSSW - grep finds a few mentions of it, but they are commented out: [DQMOffline/CalibTracker/interface/SiStripBaseServiceFromDQM.h, L163](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/e739f383ae7dc92506e31b0ef33212f548eee0ca/DQMOffline/CalibTracker/interface/SiStripBaseServiceFromDQM.h#L163), and [DQM/SiStripMonitorClient/src/SiStripInformationExtractor.cc L180](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/e739f383ae7dc92506e31b0ef33212f548eee0ca/DQM/SiStripMonitorClient/src/SiStripInformationExtractor.cc#L180), [L328](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/e739f383ae7dc92506e31b0ef33212f548eee0ca/DQM/SiStripMonitorClient/src/SiStripInformationExtractor.cc#L328), and [L365](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/e739f383ae7dc92506e31b0ef33212f548eee0ca/DQM/SiStripMonitorClient/src/SiStripInformationExtractor.cc#L365). We discussed with @fioriNTU , and it should be fine to remove this.
- `std::string HDQMInspectorConfigSiStrip::translateDetId(const uint32_t) const` seems not to be used anywhere - neither is the corresponding method in `HDQMInspectorConfigTracking`, so I would propose to remove both (together with the corresponding pure virtual method in the base class). In fact without these methods there is no difference between `HDQMInspectorConfigSiStrip` and `HDQMInspectorConfigTracking` any more - and I found no uses of any `HDQMInspectorConfig.*` (except for `HDQMInspectorConfigSiPixel` [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/e739f383ae7dc92506e31b0ef33212f548eee0ca/DQMServices/Diagnostic/test/dummyTest/SiPixelPlottingExample.C#L21), but I find no definition of that class, so that looks like an obsolete macro), so maybe these classes can be removed completely?

CC: @OlivierBondu @alesaggio @vidalm ; tracked at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/19398
title: Remove obsolete methods in SiStrip DQM that use subdetector-DetId classes
